name: Flappy Battle
description:
Flappy Battle is the game about alone cube in the space.

Sorry for problems but game is still in alpha phase. In the future will be next update for the game. I want to add this features:

  1. Enemy which we will destroy by shooting in them.
  2. Other types of barriers.
  3. Other themes of level.
  4. Story.

If you will see a bug, please write to my.
